title: transformative
extract: adjective. The definition of transformative is something, such as a lesson or experience, that inspires change or causes a shift in viewpoint. When you meet and talk to a homeless person and you change your views on poverty and politics, the encounter with the homeless person is an example of a transformative encounter ...
